price: Mola wangu Mlezi! Usinijaalie katika watu madhaalimu hao.
arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِي فِي ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Basi nakuomba usinifanye mwenye kuadhibiwa pamoja na makafiri waasi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbi falā tajʿalnī fī al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
